titleStmt.title: A wonder and yet no wonder a great red dragon in heaven.
titleStmt.author: Hyde, Edward, 1607-1659.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. Macock, for Giles Calvert, at the black spread Eagle at the west end of Pauls,

notesStmt.note: Epistle to the reader signed: Edw. Hide Junior.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "Decemb 21 1650"; imprint date crossed through.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
